title: Secularism Is Religious | There Are No Religion-Free "Neutral" Spaces
description:
If you've been listening to recent episodes of my podcast, you know that I've been focussing on addressing the myth of secularity.
The Secular Myth that became prevalent in Western civilization claimed that there were secular places free of religion, neutral spaces devoid of belief in invisible forces like spirits, gods, or magic. If we can expand our secular box and slowly minimize the sacred/spiritual box, we will make significant progress on our inevitable march towards utopia.

In this clip, I talk about why we need to interrogate that myth and why we're not that different from ancient people who didn't have easily separable categories like "spiritual" or "secular".
